sentences.en: " You're not happy,'said Hurstwood, slowly, after a slight pause.
sentences.cn: “ 你感到不快乐, “ 赫斯渥停顿了一下, 慢慢说道.

sentences.en: After a little pause, he went on with his speech.
sentences.cn: 稍停一会儿后, 他又继续讲演.

sentences.en: After a long pause , she went on.
sentences.cn: 停了好一会儿，她才继续下去。

sentences.en: After a pause Alex said sharply: "I'm sorry if I've upset you"
sentences.cn: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

sentences.en: All this plethora of sight , and feeling, and thought occurred on the instant . There was no pause of the realities wherein he moved.
sentences.cn: 尽管林林总总的形象 、 感觉 、 思想猛然袭来,在现实中他的行动却并未中断.

sentences.en: He came to a pause in reading and then went on reading.
sentences.cn: 他在阅读中停顿了一下,又继续念下去.

sentences.en: He made a pause and then went on reading.
sentences.cn: 他停顿了一下,然后又读下去.

sentences.en: He used such mannerism as " er " and " uh " to fill in a pause.
sentences.cn: 他说话间歇时总爱用 “ 呃 ” “ 嗯 ” 之类的话搭头.

sentences.en: His words were followed by a pregnant pause.
sentences.cn: 他说完话,接着是一段意味深长的停顿.

sentences.en: I saw him pause ever so slightly.
sentences.cn: 我看到他稍稍停顿了一下。

sentences.en: Let me pause on these matters for a time before I make a decision.
sentences.cn: 让我好好想想这些事情再作决定.

sentences.en: the sight of these gives any would-be attacker pause for thought.
sentences.cn: 看到这些情况，每个可能的攻击者都会踌躇不前。

sentences.en: There was a brief pause in the conversation.
There was a pause while Alice changed the tape.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯换磁带的时候出现了短暂的停顿。

sentences.en: There was a pause while the barmaid set down two plates in front of us.
sentences.cn: 酒吧女招待在我们面前摆放两个盘子时停顿了一下。

sentences.en: They pause and chew their pencils.
sentences.cn: 他们停了下来，咬着铅笔。

sentences.en: We had to pause frequently for breath.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不经常停下来喘口气.

sentences.en: When you've read up to here, you pause.

phrases.phrase: give pause to someone (或give pause for thought)

phrases.tran_cn: 踌躇；停下来好好想一想

trans.tran_en: a short time during which someone stops speaking or doing something before starting again
to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again
